hack.name: Water Droplet Physics
hack.panel:
Gravity [-126, 126]
Max Y Velocity
Max Y Velocity (use same value as above)
Drop generator: Chance to NOT spawn droplets per frame (lower = more water)
Compare random spawning chance to zero, rather than 2. This allows spawning water every frame or 2nd frame Look at this cool 00. Awesome!
00
Initial Y velocity of drops spawned by generator

panel.field: Modifies water droplet physics and Water droplet generator physics
